title: Create a Channel Mix Pie Chart
description: An analyst needs to create a pie chart that shows the percentage of website traffic coming from each marketing channel.

tasks.description: Retrieve website session data, broken down by 'Default Channel Grouping', for the last 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the data showing sessions from Organic Search, Paid Search, Direct, etc.

tasks.description: In a reporting or spreadsheet tool, create a pie chart using this data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the pie chart.

tasks.description: Ensure the chart is properly labeled with the channel names and percentages.
tasks.expected_outcome: The chart is clear, accurate, and easy to understand.
